b.  Which, if any, of the candidates—A, B, C,or D—is not eliminated by the

EXAMPLE:Case 1:ABC             DG
Case 2:AB C DG
Case 3:AB             C             D              G
a.  Only Cpasses the SCT.
b.  Only Cand Dpass the NCT.
c.   Only Cpasses both tests.
